bug.short_desc: I can't move the scrollbar when this is joined together with another pane

long_desc.thetext:
When the scrollbar is joined together with another pane, I can't move the scrollbar if the mouse is over. I can only drag the pane.
This bug is present when I am using firefox (my version is 30.0) to see this website: http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/playground/
When I use opera and chrome in the mentioned example there is no scrollbar.
When the scrollbar is very wide this situation is not annoying. For example this website using firefox or chrome: http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/demobrowser/#
But I think that the mentioned problem would appear with a narrower scrollbar.

This is by design as the split panes do have a invisible handle to grab for better usabilty. This handle is by default 6 px wider than the splitter itself. Sure, that can cause trouble if you put a small scroll bar right next to it but if you have that, you can change the offset of the splitter [1].
[1] http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/apiviewer/#qx.ui.splitpane.Pane~offset
